mapper.select: SELECT SUM(cancelTotal) AS 'failTotal' ,SUM(successTotal) AS 'sucTotal' ,SUM(commissionTotal) AS 'cmTotal' ,result.ym AS 'ymDate' ,result.last AS 'last' FROM ( SELECT SUM(f.b_cancel) AS 'cancelTotal' , 0 AS 'successTotal' ,SUM(f.b_cancel) AS 'commissionTotal' ,DATE_FORMAT(f.tr_fail_date,'%y년 %m월') AS 'ym' ,LAST_DAY(f.tr_fail_date) AS 'last' FROM tb_trade_fail AS f GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(f.tr_fail_date,'%y%m') UNION SELECT 0 AS 'cancelTotal' ,SUM(o.c_trade_cm) AS 'successTotal' ,SUM(o.c_trade_cm) AS 'commissionTotal' ,DATE_FORMAT(i.b_mo_date,'%y년 %m월') AS 'ym' ,LAST_DAY(i.b_mo_date) AS 'last' FROM tb_trade_payment_out AS o LEFT join tb_trade_priority AS r ON o.tr_pr_code = r.tr_pr_code LEFT JOIN tb_trade_payment_in AS i ON r.tr_pr_code = i.tr_pr_code GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(i.b_mo_date,'%y%m') ) AS result GROUP BY ym LIMIT #{start},#{end}
